description:
Most of v3 servers core API missing decorator expected_errors.

All the v3 api should be under the protection of expected_errors
title: V3 servers core API missing decorator expected_errors

Branch:    master

commit 83b37aeb5da8af6e305098a7e698d058f431f332
Author: He Jie Xu <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Jul 18 11:53:23 2014 +0800

    Add decorator expected_errors to V3 servers core
    
    All v3 api should use expected_errors to prevent unexpected exception
    raised. This patch add decorator expected_errors for v3 servers core.
    
    Change-Id: Ia1fa09d6cf68a65c85ac5fd2aff9b9202d76e7ca
    Closes-Bug: #1343778
